Class ImageUtils

    • com.github.brunothg.game.engine.image.ImageUtils

extends Object
    Utility class for images.
    Author:
    Marvin Bruns

      • BufferedImage

        public static BufferedImage BufferedImage(Image img,
                          int type)
        Uses ImageIcon to ensure that the image is completely loaded.
        See Also:
        BufferedImage(Image, ImageObserver, int)

      • BufferedImage

        public static BufferedImage BufferedImage(Image img,
                          ImageObserver observer,
                          int type)
        Convert a Image in a BufferedImage
        Parameters:
        img - Image to convert
        observer - ImageObserver
        type - BufferedImage.TYPE_INT_ARGB etc.
        Returns:
        the img as BufferedImage

      • getScaledInstance

        public static BufferedImage getScaledInstance(Image img,
                              int width,
                              int height,
                              ImageObserver observer)
        Uses BufferedImage.TYPE_INT_ARGB
        See Also:
        getScaledInstance(Image, int, int, int, ImageObserver)

      • getScaledInstance

        public static BufferedImage getScaledInstance(Image img,
                              int width,
                              int height,
                              int type,
                              ImageObserver observer)
        Get a scaled version of an image
        Parameters:
        img - The image to scale
        width - New width
        height - New height
        type - The image type e.g. BufferedImage.TYPE_INT_ARGB
        observer - ImageObserver

      • clearImage

        public static void clearImage(BufferedImage img,
              Color clear)
        Clear a BufferedImage with the given color.
        Parameters:
        img - Image to be cleared
        clear - Color used for clearing this object. Only this color will be present
        See Also:
        clearImage(Graphics2D, int, int, Color)

      • clearImage

        public static void clearImage(Graphics2D g2d,
              int width,
              int height,
              Color clear)
        Clears a Graphics2D object with the given Color. Alpha values will replace the current alpha. The resulting Graphics2D object will be transparent.
        Parameters:
        g2d - Graphics2D object to be cleared
        width - Width of the area
        height - Height of the area
        clear - Color used for clearing this object. Only this color will be present

      • shapeToImage

        public static BufferedImage shapeToImage(Shape shape,
                         Color shapeColor,
                         boolean fill)
        Converts a Shape into a BufferedImage
        Parameters:
        shape - Shape do be drawn
        shapeColor - Color in which the shape will be drawn
        fill - if true the shape will be filled in. Otherwise only the outlines will be painted.
        Returns:
        The shape as image

      • deepCopy

        public static BufferedImage deepCopy(BufferedImage image)
        Create a deep copy of an BufferedImage. Properties will be dismissed. May fail.
        Parameters:
        image - Image to be copied
        Returns:
        Copied image

      • copy

        public static BufferedImage copy(BufferedImage image)
        Create a copy of an BufferedImage.
        Parameters:
        image - Image to be copied
        Returns:
        Copied image

      • createEmptyCursor

        public static Cursor createEmptyCursor(String name)
        Create an invisible cursor

      • transform

        public static BufferedImage transform(BufferedImage img,
                      AffineTransform transformation)
        Transform a BufferedImage using an AffineTransform. The returned image is the same as passed as Argument. All work is done direct on the image.

      • mirror

        public static BufferedImage mirror(BufferedImage img,
                   boolean mirrorX,
                   boolean mirrorY)
        Mirror a BufferedImage. The returned image is a new BufferedImage.

      • colorize

        public static BufferedImage colorize(BufferedImage img,
                     Color c)
        The given BufferedImage will be colorized with the given Color. Brightness will be used to modify the given color.
        The operation is done direct on the provided image.

      • createSprite

        public static BufferedImage createSprite(int frameWidth,
                         int frameHeight,
                         BufferedImage... frames)
        Fetch single frames and connect them, so that you get a single sprite image.
        Parameters:
        frameWidth - Width of one single frame
        frameHeight - Height of one single frame
        frames - The frames for the sprite
        Returns:
        An image containing all given frames. Frames will be stretched to match frameWidth and frameHeight
